doc.title: The Hedonist
doc.plot: Surfing charters are meant to be a trip to Paradise. With five male surfers stuck on a boat, there's bound to be some friction. But when two of the passengers are replaced at the last minute with gorgeous girls - the heat is turned way up. For Bull, Archie, Sam, Toobs, Rob, Alex and the Skipper, the trip starts of perfectly. The one 'single girl' on board - Sam, enjoys all the male attention. Sam soon has them all wrapped around her finger as she challenges Bull in his authority making him make a forceful move on her in the isolation of a Maldives beach. Outraged, the others beat and abandon him on an island, but the ever-determined Bull returns. It's a nightmare battle of wits, on board the yacht, as the five imprisoned friends - Archie, Sam, Toobs, Rob & Alex must survive the fury of the madman at the helm.
